mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(L.LECTURE_CREDIT), 0) FROM Enrollment E JOIN Lecture L ON E.ENROLLMENT_LECTURE_ID = L.LECTURE_ID WHERE E.ENROLLMENT_STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}

SELECT LT.LECTURETIME_ID AS id, LT.LECTURETIME_LECTURE_ID AS lectureId, LT.LECTURETIME_DAY_OF_WEEK AS dayOfWeek, LT.LECTURETIME_START_TIME AS startTime, LT.LECTURETIME_END_TIME AS endTime FROM Enrollment E JOIN Lecturetime LT ON E.ENROLLMENT_LECTURE_ID = LT.LECTURETIME_LECTURE_ID WHERE E.ENROLLMENT_STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} ORDER BY FIELD(LT.LECTURETIME_DAY_OF_WEEK, 'MON','TUE','WED','THU','FRI','SAT','SUN'), LT.LECTURETIME_START_TIME ASC

SELECT E.ENROLLMENT_ID AS enrollmentId, L.LECTURE_ID AS lectureId, L.LECTURE_COURSE_NAME AS courseName, L.LECTURE_PROFESSOR AS professor, L.LECTURE_CREDIT AS credit, L.LECTURE_DIVISION AS division, L.LECTURE_ROOM AS room, E.ENROLLMENT_CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM Enrollment E JOIN Lecture L ON E.ENROLLMENT_LECTURE_ID = L.LECTURE_ID WHERE E.ENROLLMENT_STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} ORDER BY E.ENROLLMENT_CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Lecture SET LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT = LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT + 1 WHERE LECTURE_ID = #{lectureId} AND LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT < LECTURE_MAX_CAPACITY
UPDATE Lecture SET LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT = LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT - 1 WHERE LECTURE_ID = #{lectureId} AND LECTURE_CURRENT_COUNT > 0
